text: The vastness of space. Suddenly a hole in the sky opens w flash and a SPACESHIP rumbles into view. On its hull the USEA PROTECTOR. Magnificent, though on closer inspection shudders ever so slightly, denoting pre-CGI model work on budget. We're watching a TV show.
We're exiting the time knot now sir.
5 Members of the crew of the USEA PROTECTOR sit in the la 1979-“high-tech” cabin. All of them human except for one, LAZARUS, a cross between a human and a raptor. The crewma exchange relieved smiles.
We're alive.
We made it. Captain, we made it!
By Grabthar’s hammer, we live to tell the tale.
Systems register functional.

All systems are working, Captain. Captain?... They all turn to look at THE CAPTAIN, who turns to reveal dramatically. Good looking. His acting is classic Charlto take-no-prisoners style. He looks around the command deck worried, almost sniffing the air.
I don’t like it. It was too easy... Look for ambient energy fields.
All normal sir... The entire spectrum.
Check again.
Yes sir, I- Wait. My god. His radar lights up with dots. First a few, then HUNDREDS
They're everywhere. There are time knots opening everywhere.
Suddenly an EXPLOSION rocks the ship. The crew goes SCUT one side of the ship then back in classic “the ship is ro fashion.
A trap.
We’re surrounded Captain. The entire 5k Ranking is out there.
Our plasma armor?
Gone sir. Another BLAST rocks the room. (Close inspection reveals t ef the actors scuttle more than others.)
Structural damage at 68 percent.
We're getting major structural damage!
It's a core meltdown sir. It can’t be stopped! The Captain turns to his advisor, Lazarus.
Captain, surrender may be our only option.
No, never give up... NEVER surrender!
The reactor has eaten through four levels... Six levels... The ship is disintegrating!
Your orders sir? Another SIREN sounds. The Captain pauses, considering the situation. His face a melodramatic collage of emotions.
Sir. Your orders? He walks into close up, steely determination on his face.

Activate the Omega 13. The crewmates exchange expectant and terrified glances. C of a crewman’s hand as he pushes down a CRYSTALLIN ROD wh turn opens five layers of mechanical locks revealing a se looking lever. The Captain pulls that lever. A MACHINE is revealed, rising from the floor in the midd room. It begins to GLOW. Cut to each actor in turn reacti dramatically. Then suddenly... THE PICTURE GOES WHITE, LEADER NUMBERS APPEAR, with a STU COPYRIGHT notice.

HUNDREDS OF FACES - ENTHRALLED LEGIONS of mostly spotty f adolescent FANS staring into camera. For a moment all is A few are sobbing. Then a BURST OF THUNDEROUS APPLAUSE... at a SCIENCE FICTION CONVENTION. The enthusiastic crowd o nerds, and complete geeks continue cheering as the master ceremonies GUY takes the stage.

Well, there you are! You are the first people to see the lost GALAXY QUEST episode 53 two parter since it was originally aired in ‘82! (the fans cheer) As most of you know, no concluding episode was filmed when the series was cancelled, so the episode was never included in the syndication run. Let’s hear it for Travis Latke, who actually rescued the footage from the studio garbage. They were going to throw it out! Can you believe that? (Latke stands, fans cheer) Now for the moment you’ve all been waiting for... The intrepid crew of the USEA PROTECTOR! The audience cheers, but a STAGEHAND in the wings signals to “stretch.”
But first... What is a “hero”? Let’s take a look at a few more clips... The audience groans, impatient.

Here we meet the REAL LIFE ACTORS all dressed as their TV egos... GWEN DEMARCO, beautiful, in a sexy and improbable suit. SIR ALEXANDER DANE, (DR. LAZARUS) irritable, wearin alien prosthetic makeup. DUSTY KWAN, calm, sitting on an off in a corner reading the paper. TOMMY WEBBER, the youn the group.
Where the hell is he?
An hour and a half late. I can’t believe he’d do this to us again.
I believe it, the bastard. He doesn't care about anybody but himself.
You guys hear he scheduled a fan appearance without us?
You’ re kidding. When for?
Tomorrow morning, before the store opening. My agent told me.
But we made a pact. We said we'd stick together.

Right, like he’s got poyatty to anyone. This is the guy who tried to kill off Alex's character when it became too popular... Am I right, Alex? Alex?... They all turn to see Alexander staring into a makeup mirr roaming over his alien green makeup and scaly rubber feat a mournful expression.
Uh oh... Alex, get away from that thing...
(staring into mirror) Dear god... How did I come to this?
Didn’t we specifically say NO MIRRORS?...
I played Richard III at the Royal National Theater before her Majesty the Queen!..
(quietly, as he flips a page) “Five curtain calls...”
...Five curtain calls! I was an ACTOR once, damn it. Now look at me. LOOK AT ME.
Settle down, Alex...
No. I can’t go out there! I won't say that ridiculous catch phrase one more time. I won't. I can’t!
At least you had a PART. You had a character people loved! My TV guide interview was six paragraphs about this body suit. About my legs. (MORE)
GWEN (cont'd) How did I perfect my trademark sidesaddle pose? ’ Nobody even bothered to ask what I DO on the ship. Nobody knows. Do you? Does anybody?
You were the, uh... Wait I’1ll think of it...
I repeated the computer. Whatever it said, I turned and said to the rest of you. I spoke the obvious. Nothing I did ever affected the plot not ONCE. Nothing I did was ever taken SERIOUSLY.

Guys. I’m an African American playing a Malaysian named “Laredo.” HELLO! Suddenly the rear stage doors open, bright light streams JASON NESMITH ("The Captain”) appears, strolling in in hi confident exuberant charming way.
My friends, your Captain has arrived! He pats Tommy on the back.
Am I too late for Alexanders’s panic attack? (looks at him) Apparently so. He squeezes Alexander’s shoulder, leans in to inspect a g green plastic mole on his neck.
That's irregular, you should have it looked at. He flicks Dusty’s newspaper, reads over his shoulder. Dus out a hand for a mild five without looking up.
Lakers are HOT. (kisses Gwen on the cheek) Speaking of which... You look amazing. He locks up to see the others glaring at him. A beat.
Okay, what did I do now?
On the stage, Guy continues to stall...

..-Sure, the rocks looked like paper mache, and the sets moved when anyone bumped into them... But we didn’t care... FILM CLIPS are projected behind him: On an alien planet CAPTAIN carries the LIMP BODY OF HIS ADVISOR, LAZARUS, ra erupting around him... On the command deck the crew fight battle with crack precision TEAMWORK....

..-For those four seasons from ‘79 to ‘82 we the viewers developed the same affection for the crew of the USEA PROTECTOR that the crew had for each other... These weren't just adventurers exploring space, these were friends...
The others surround JASON, fighting.
You said we do appearances together, or not at all!
I didn’t say that. I said “wouldn’t it be great if we could always work together.” That’s what I said.
Unbelievable.
You are so full of shit.
What's the big deal? A few fans built a little set in their garage. I come in for an hour at most. It’s a nothing.
How much of.a nothing? Not enough to split five ways kind of a nothing?

What do you want me to say, Gwen?... They wanted the Captain. Suddenly bright light streams in. They all turn to see AL skulking out the exit. A beat, then they all run to catch Alexander, TACKLING HIM.

Guy gets a thumbs up cue from a stagehand and begins to i the cast, much to the delight of the applauding FANS. Guy Okay, here we go... Let’s hear a warm welcome for crack Navigator and Gunner “Lt. Laredo”, Tommy Webber!  . Tommy comes bounding out with a big smile, his hair musse screen behind is a projected film clip of Tommy in action
“If it’s got proton thrusters, I can fly it.”
Ship's Tech Sergeant Chen... Dusty Kwan! Dusty strolls out with a casual wave.
“I'll reverse the polarity. It’s our only hope.”
Gwen and Jason are wrestling on the ground with Alexander
Alex you can’t just leave.
I was knighted by the queen!!!
Come on, old friend...
Friend. You stole all my best lines. You cut me out of episode three entirely! One evil twin wasn’t enough, no you had to have TWO evil twins!..-
The beautiful shipmate Tawny Madison... GWEN
Gwen hears her introduction and stands, leaving Jason to Alexander.
He’s all yours.
Gwen takes the stage. In the film clip, Tawny Madison loo around the cabin fearfully. SHIP’S COMPUTER One hundred degrees and rising...

“It's... It’s getting hotter, Captain!” Many “appreciative” WHISTLES. Gwen forces a smile.  Gcuy And now... The Captain’s advisor and closest friend. His peaceful nature ever at odds with the savage warrior inside him, after witnessing the massacre of his entire species as a boy... We see a split screen shot of Alexander, one peaceful and like, the other a savage reptilian beast, tearing into a
Jason is still in a wrestling match with Alexander.
You WILL go out there.
I won’t and nothing you say-
“The show must go on.”
(a beat) Damn you! Damn you! GUY (cont'd) (0.S.) “pr. Lazarus of Tev’meck”... Sir Alexander Dane! Alex bounds up on stage, bowing deep with grace and humil stage trained British actor.
“By Grabthar’s hammer, you shall be avenged!” Alex cringes, desperately unhappy.
And finally, my fellow Questarians, the brave Captain of the USEA PROTECTOR... Peter Quincy Taggart ... JASON NESMITH. Jason appears and a SPOTLIGHT follows him on.
Unbelievable. He rented a SPOT? The Jason raises his hands like a conductor, encouraging the cry out in unison...
“NEVER GIVE UP, NEVER SURRENDER... DAMN THE NEUTRINO CANNONS... FULL SPEED AHEAD!” The fans go crazy. The actors exchange glances.
The Captain and his crew will be signing autographs on imperial decks “b” and “ce” near the coke machines.

It's quiet. We're on FOUR PAIRS OF BOOTS walking down the hallway. We PAN UP to reveal FIVE SERIOUS LOOKING YOUNG P men and a woman, clean cut as Disneyland employees and im outfitted in GALAXY QUEST style uniforms. There’s somethi about their movements and be avior you can’t quite put yo on.. For now we'll refer to them as THE PECULIAR FANS. Th say a word to each other as they walk down the hallway an the bustling

We move with the PECULIAR FANS through the convention flo the numerous FANS dressed as their favorite GALAXY QUEST characters... through the various booths selling GALAXY Q other Sci-fi memorabilia, catching snippets of conversati the way: ...They pass two ELABORATELY COSTUMED ALIEN FANS talking.

...Yeah, I used to be Gark’nor of Ang but I got a rash from the chest pads so now I’m Sacnod from episode 5, which is fine except the transducer pinches when I sit down... ...They pass a group of particularly EARNEST (geeky) FANS vendor’s booth, also costumed as the five GALAXY QUEST le Their leader, BRANDON WHEEGER, inspects a seller’s model DEFENDER, contemptuously.

The tail fin is concave, not convex. The proton reactor is where the influx thermistors should be and.. my god... is this Testor’s blue green number six on the hull? (drops the model roughly) I... I... This is a complete abortion. With curious glances to this similarly uniformed group, t PECULIAR FANS move past, then come to a halt as they spot JASON, up on a raised platform at the front of the hall s autographs for a long line of fans. The peculiar fans stare at Jason as iff they were in the of God. They exchange astonished smiles and one of them e grows misty. Then they start toward him...
Gwen, Tommy, Alexander and Dusty sign autographs at a row tables near Jason, but significantly lower than his perch  10.
Is it me or does that sonofabitch’s table get higher every convention? One of many fans dressed as “Dr. Lazarus” steps up to Ale and salutes him with crossed fists.
“By Grabthar’s hammer, by the suns of Warvan, I shall avenge you!” Alexander ignores this, grabs the photo from his hand, si thrusts it back. The next fan steps up.
“By Grabthar’s hammer, by the-” He signs and thrusts it back before he can even finish.
Next! Guy (the MC) approaches the actors at their tables.
Hi everybody.
Hey. Thanks for the great intro, uh...

Guy... You probably don’t remember me, do you? (they stare at him blankly) I was on the show in ‘79. Episode 12? Got killed by the lava monster before the first commercial? “Crewman #6?” The actors pretend that they remember him. “oh, right! Gu
Listen, I was wondering, would you guys mind if I sit in today? See if anybody’s interested in an autograph? I mean, who knows...
Sure, Guy, if you can take the excitement. Two more FANS dressed as Alexander’s character approach h proudly CHATTERING at him in Lazarus’ “Mak’tar” language.
Don’t make me get a restraining order.

THE PECULIAR FANS are making their way through the crowd Jason. They have to step aside as a procession of fans pa through on their way to the costume contest. As the pecul stand there we suddenly notice something very strange;  ll. THE LEFT HAND of the tallest one is flickering like bad v on a TV, buzzing between a normal hand and A HAND WITH FO BLUE TENTACLES WHERE FINGERS SHOULD BE. The LEADER notices the flickering and motions to the affl man. The tall man raps sharply against a metal blinking b belt a few times -- like you might a broken radio -- and becomes normal again. He looks up, nods at the leader. Fr we'll just refer to these 5 as THE ALIENS.
Guy now sits with the others, forlorn. No fans are in lin autograph. He watches as Dusty fields questions from the dedicated fans led by the fastidious BRANDON.
Mr. Kwan? In episode nineteen, when the reactor fused, you used an element from Leopold Six to fix the thrusters. What was that called?
Bivrakium.
The blue sheath it was encased in- ?
A bi-thermal krevlite housing. Brandon makes a note, thanks him and exits with his group Guy How do you remember this stuff?
Oh I just make it up. Use lots of “k”s and “v"s. A male FAN moves up to Gwen, hands her a picture to «ign.
I’m a big fan Ms. Demarco. Gwen looks at the photo, nonplussed.
You really expect me to sign a naked picture of myself? This isn’t even my body!

Yeah, normally with fakes it’s like, recycle bin. But.. This one’s really good. (Gwen sighs, starts to sign) Could you not write over the... Thanks. A fan finally approaches Guy who looks up eagerly. The fa at him quizzically, trying to place him.  — ———— 12.
Episode 12. (gets no reaction) Killed by the lava monster?..
(turns to Tommy) Mr. Webber, could I get an autograph? Guy shrugs, disappointed. Gwen gives him a comforting loo looks across at
Talking dramatically to a group of fans.
...on one hand, if I had moved an inch, the beast would have killed me. On the other hand, my crew was in danger...
How did you know what to do?
Without a crew, I’m not a Captain. (he smiles) And we all know what happened to that beast on Enok 7... The fans make happy nerdy “we sure do” noises.
Gwen shakes her head appreciatively.
You gotta admit, they do love him.
Almost as much as he loves himself. They watch as Jason fields another question from a fan.
...I'm glad you asked... To me the most important qualities of a Galaxy Explorer are loyalty...
...to camera center no matter whose shot you're blocking...
Leadership....
...to make sure craft service keeps those little butter cookies, and plenty of them...  13.
And determination.

-..to playing scenes shirtless because the ladies do love Captain Furry. Gwen, Alex and the others try to contain their laughter a CLOSER ANGLE - JASON’S TABLE Bored with the constant queries of his fans, Jason glance see Gwen smiling at him. He smiles back, unaware that her is at his expense. She quickly looks away, self-conscious doesn’t even take his eyes off Gwen as BRANDON steps forw brow knit with serious matters.

Captain, please settle a dispute that my crew and I are having. In “The Quasar Dilemma”, the Sentient had taken control of the ship’s guidance systems, however- Jason stands, his attention still on Gwen.
Excuse me guys. Jason exits. Brandon turns to his friends, frustrated.
I hadn’t even gotten to the relevant conundrum...
Gwen answers a question from a shy NERD GIRL.
Miss Demarco?... In episode 15, “Caverns of Delos 5?” I got the feeling you and the Captain kind of... had a thing... in the cave when you were sealed off together... Did you?
The Captain and I NEVER had a thing. Jason sidles up.
That’s her story. The nerd girl giggles and exits, leaving Jason and Gwen a
So decent of you to come mingle with the little people.
Okay, what’s up Gwen? I know you. It's not my little fan appearance tomorrow that’s got you so pissed off. What is it?
Where were you on Tuesday?
Tuesday, Tuesday... Oh, Jake's birthday, right... Is that all you’re mad about?
Is that all? He did your makeup every day, put up with all your crap, never complained once and you couldn’t take one stupid hour out of your night to toast him at his birthday?
I meant to but I got busy. Hey, you know if Jake ever really needed anything I'd be there for him. I admit, I’m not great with the small stuff, but with the big stuff...
He died yesterday. Cardiac arrest. This shuts Jason up. He looks a bit stunned.
Shit. Old Jake? I was... I was going to-

But you didn’t. (beat) You have this image of yourself, Jason. Maybe it’s the show. Maybe it's the way you saw yourself as a kid. Well, I hate to break it to you, but you’re not that guy. You're not the guy you think you are.
Jason looks stunned. He starts to say something, but seem genuinely affected. He turns and walks away. Gwen feels b
Shit...

Jason moves forward, introspective, amidst the enthusiast They all shout out questions and comments to him... But J pushes past without response and takes refuge in the- MEN’S ROOM Jason enters to witness the incongruous sight of four MAN beasts at the urinals taking a MANK’NAR piss.  1s. He enters a stall and sits on the lid, trying to get a md think. But two CYNICAL 20-SOMETHINGS enter, laughing thei off.
You're right. What a FREAK SHOW. This is fricking HILARIOUS.
Yeah, what a bunch of losers. And those poor actors. They’ve done, like, WHAT for twenty years? I think Dusty Kwan did a dog food commercial... Sad.
Did you hear Nesmith up there? That’s the saddest. I think he actually gets off on these nerds thinking he’s space captain. It’s pathetic. And his friends...
...they HATE him. I know, did you hear them ragging on him? “Loyalty...to center stage.”

He has no idea that he’s a laughingstock... Even to his buddies. They exit, their laughter ringing in Jason’s ears. CONVENTION FLOOR - JASON’S TABLE Jason is back at his table signing autographs in a foul m scribbles his name irritably, avoiding contact with the f BRANDON and his group of nerds approach hin.

Captain, as I was saying... In “The Quasar Dilemma”, the Sentient had taken control of your ship’s systems, and you used the auxiliary of deck b to gain control. But the CD ROMS of the ship guidance systems indicate that the auxiliary of deck b is not tied to the main power grid, so we were wondering then where the error lies.
{he stares at them a beat) What’s wrong with you?
Excuse me?
It’s a television show. Okay? That’s all. It’s just a bunch of fake sets, and wooden props, do you understand?
Yes but, we were wondering-  16.

There IS no quantum flux and there is no auxiliary... There’s no goddamn ship! Do you get it? Do YOU? Gwen and the others notice the commotion at the other tab exchange glances. Jason is now standing.

...Throwing away your time and energy on a TV show that’s been off the air for twenty years! What the hell is wrong with you? Jason notices that all eyes are turned on him. The hall h deathly quiet. Angry and ashamed, he rises and exits thro hall. Brandon and the fans do their best not to take this personally. Tommy turns to Alex, stunned.
Wow. What was that?
I’ve said for years. He’s mentally deranged.
Jason strides down the hallway. As he turns the corner he into the five ALIENS. Their leader, BETZALAR, pauses, bow head respectfully before addressing Jason.
Captain, I must speak to you. I am Betzalar of the Theramin Nebula. We have come on a matter of supreme importance...

He pushes past them and continues away down the hallway. INT. JASON’S BEDROOM Jason sits on the edge of the bed. Gulps down the last of of scotch. He flips channels. We pan to THE TELEVISION as the channels change; late night fare.. numbers... infomercial for a Flowbee.... He stops at the conclusion of an episode of GALAXY QUEST... Captain Tagga a heroic speech. Jason begins to mouth the words along wi alterego.

As long as there is injustice, whenever a Targathian baby cries out, wherever a distress signal sounds among the stars... We'll be there. This fine ship, and this fine crew...  17. ’ We pan back to the bed... Jason has passed out, body twis down in a pillow. FADE OUT.
Jason sleeps, hungover, dead to the world. His DOORBELL RINGS. He barely moves. Every indication is dead. More ringing. He stirs enough to groan, and drags a ever his head. The ringing continues....
Jason opens the door in his robe, drooping bloodshot eyes of a headache... There before him are

dressed in their perfect GALAXY QUEST attire. Jason stare them, bleary eyed. With earnest respectful faces, the fiv him inthe classic “GALAXY QUEST” style. Jason shuts the d their face. CUT TO BLACK... DING DONG! The door opens again.

The leader, BETZALAR, steps forward. Speaks quickly. BETZALAR . Sir, I understand this is a terrible breach of protocol- But please, we've come on a long journey at great risk, and I beg you to hear our plea. We are Thermians from the Klatu Nebula. Our people are being systematically hunted and slaughtered by Roth’h’ar Sarris of Fatu-Krey. Out of self preservation we have constructed a duplicate of your ship, The Protector, from your historical records, your computer databases... Sarris, our nemesis, wants the ship, he is particularly interested in the Omega 13. We are to meet in a negotiation. However our past efforts in this regard have been nothing short of disastrous. The flames, the death... (he quickly gathers himself) You are our last hope. Your leadership, your courage, your skills at negotiation and diplomacy are our only bid for survival. Jason scans his brain, then two synapses connect.

Oh, right! The thing with the thing. My agent told me. Sorry. Come on in, I’1ll get some pants on.  18. INT. JASON’S HOUSE The four aliens stand on one side of the room. Jason, mos dressed, hunts under his couch for something.

Captain, sir. I speak for all of us when I say that standing here in your presence is the greatest honor we could ever have hoped to achieve in our lifetimes. Mostly all they can see of Jason at the moment is his but
Thanks, appreciate it... Anybody seen my other shoe? The others look around the room for the shoe.
Jason enters and sits in the back with the aliens. Betzal motions the driver to go.
Sir, I am Neru, senior requisition officer. Before we travel to the ship, please let me know if you have any requirements. Weapons, documents, personnel...
{half awake) I could use a Coke. One of the aliens nods to the other who makes a note.

Sir, I am Teb. I would like to explain the historical situation between our people and the - Sarris Dominion in greater detail. In the 5 million years following the great nebula burst our people were one...
How about him? Doesn’t he talk?
His translator is broken. The fourth alien says something, but it comes out a weird sounds. Like a screaming baby inside a bagpipe.

Okey doke... So, listen, I had a late night with a Kreemorian Fangor Beast, so I’m going to shut my eyes for a bit. But keep going, I’m still listening... Jason is asleep before Teb gets the next sentence out.  19.
Jason is shaken softly by the shoulders. He opens his eye a young female CREWMAN in GALAXY QUEST uniform, LALIARI.
I am sorry to wake you, siz, but your presence is requested on the command deck. Jason tries to reorient himself as she leads him forward.
Laliari escorts Jason down the high tech hallway. Jason l around, still holding his can of Coke.
Sir, Sarris has moved the deadline. We are approaching his ship at the Ni-delta now. He wants an answer to his proposal. I understand you have been briefed.
Yeah, I got most of it in the car. He’s the bad guy, right?

Yes sir he is a very bad man indeed. He has tortured our scientists, put us to work in the gallium arsenide mines, captured our females for his own demented purposes... JASON . Okay I’ve got the picture. Let’s see what old Sarris has to say for himself. Betzalar approaches with other CREWMEMBERS.
Captain... Welcome to the Protector II. Would you like to don your uniform?
Mind if we skip that? I have to get back pretty quick for this thing in Van Nuys.
As you wish. Another ALIEN comes running up out of breath.
Sir... It’s Sarris. He's here.
A door slides OPEN and Jason and the others enter the COM DECK.... It’s straight out of the TV show.  20. Blinking lights, consoles, the cool old tech displays... looks around, genuinely impressed.
Not bad. I was expecting some cardboard boxes in a garage. They lead him to the Captain’s chair. He sits.
I mean, I’ve never even seen the real one all put together like this. They’d shoot the master this way, then they’d pull the back walls for the reverse angles and... This thing have a cup holder?
We're approaching in five ticks, sir. Command to slow? Jason looks toward the front window/view screen. Stars mo in a familiar display.
Sure, set the screen saver on two. The NAVIGATOR looks at him, confused.

Sorry. Sorry. Didn’t mean to break the mood. Slow to Mark 2, lieutenant. A SHIP appears on the screen, growing closer. It is a MEN craft, sharp and jagged, with a gargoyle shaped figurehea ship slows to a stop, looking like the Cathedral of Notre Then the VIEWSCREEN fuzzes to life with an image of...
He’s ugly and green hued. Black sharp teeth. A metal hand hisses... There is a beat as the aliens take in the sight to well their courage.
I see fear. That is expected. The whole room resonates with his voice.

Ah, they bring a new Captain... Such a cowardly race. Not even your own kind... No matter. Here are my demands, and I would suggest, Captain, that you think well before speaking a word, because these negotiations are... tender... and if I do not like what I hear... There will be blood and pain as you cannot imagine... Jason takes a sip of coke and checks his watch.  21.
First, I require the Omega 13... Second-

(blase, like a laundry list) Okey dokey, let's fire blue disrupters full. Fire red disrupters full. Fire gannet magnets left and right. Fire pulse catapults from all chutes. And throw this thing at him too, killer. He hands the GUNNER the empty coke can, then before even -.-he exits!
Jason emerges and looks both ways trying to get his beari Several of the aliens chase after him as he enters the co exchanging stunned glances, trying to absorb the magnitud just happened.
Captain?... Where are you... going?
(shrugs) Home.
You... You mean Earth?
Yeah. “Earth.” Time to get back to “Earth,” kids. He turns a corner. Jason is oblivious to the very soft mu sounds of explosions, traces of the demolition going on o
But Captain... The negotiation... You... You... You fired on him!
Right. Long live... What’s your planet?
Theramin.
Long live Theramin! Take a left here?
What if Sarris survives?
Oh, I don’t think. so. I gave him both barrels.
He has a very powerful ship. Perhaps you would like to... Wait to see the results of...
I would but I am REALLY running late and the 134’s a parking lot after 2:00. But listen, the guy gives you any more trouble, just give a ca. see Betzalar produces a walkie talkie device for Jason.
An interstellar vox.
Thanks. Betzalar looks him in the eye. A TEAR starts down his che HUGS Jason, then shakes his hand sincerely.
How can we thank you, Captain. You- You have saved our people.
It was a lot of fun. You kids are great. The others shake his hand, thanking him as they enter the

A room with a very high circular ceiling. In the middle o room are a number of red lighted disks about the size of covers. The aliens thank Jason, leading him onto the disk they depart, everybody waving their good-byes. Jason realizes he’s left all alone in this strange room w visible doors.

Wait. Where’s the car? Suddenly a CLEAR CYLINDER rises from the circumference of and deforms around him, ENCASING HIM IN A BULLET SHAPED C It’s as if he’s sealed in a lucite paperweight. There is instant to register surprise as... The ceiling divides, opening like an iris. The ROAR of es oxygen, and an AWE INDUCING ROTATING STARFIELD is reveale expanding circle... The WALLS pull back around him. And J suddenly finds himself surrounded by THE INFINITE VASTNESS OF SPACE. And before he can fully register the HORROR of his situat Jason in his pod is ROCKETED FORWARD INTO SPACE.  23.

He HURTLES FORWARD, the acceleration impossible, faster a faster... It's the entire 30 minute ending of 2001 in 10 Overwhelming. A rollercoaster at light speed. The univers and snaps like a rubber band. Planets scatter in front of bowling pins and he quickly finds himself heading toward an undulating BLACK HOLE... Toward the mass so dense it e absorbs light and time... And on impact the screen is fil

We pull back slowly from the iris of Jason's eye. He is n standing on the black disk in the middle of his own back stands there in shock, SHIVERING IN WAVES AND WAVES from incomprehension of what he’s just experienced, unable to the spot.

INT. BRANDON’S GARAGE - TARZANA - DUSK Crickets chirp. Inside the open garage of a suburban hous BRANDON and his friends in their uniforms, surrounded by homemade space ship interior constructed of painted cardb boxes and Christmas lights. Brandon and his friends look disappointed... The Captain never showed.

Stand by. The others stare at the vox, silenced. Re has their atten

Yes sir. Right away sir.. Targeting the largest asteroid in the Andromeda chain. Detonation in Five seconds. Three.. two... The others look at the sky, starting to get sucked in.

No, I don’t. But they do. I know how this is going to sound, but I don’t care; Going up there changed me. I know deep down that for once in my life, I can do something really good and really meaningful - We all can do something... amazing! (he stands) Look, I realize I can’t convince you with words. Just come to my house at eight. You’1l see the transport pod. It looks like a manhole cover, but wait ‘till you see what happens... Then you can do whatever you want, okay? He starts away. Jason...  27.
Eight o’clock. Just trust me. Please trust me, just this once. The others exchange distrustful glances.

Captain... Evidently we had some miscommunication regarding yesterday’s scheduled voyage, and-
Sorry I'm in a real hurry. He gathers his things and quickly walks to his car. The o nerds look at Brandon.
He dissed us AGAIN, Brandon!
(hiding his disappointment) He probably... Has some very important business to attend to... The others want to believe that too.
Yeah... I guess so... They shuffle off, despondent. JASON’S CAR Jason drives. He reaches into his pocket for his Vox, and the “talk” switch.
Hello? (no response) Protector? Betzalar? Anybody there?  28.

He taps the vox, then notices a tag on the bottom that re “PROPERTY OF BRANDON WHEEGER.” He thinks about driving ba checks his watch, then shrugs and drives on. INT. He opens the door and moves F INT. GWEN'S HOUSE/ALEXANDER’S APARTMENT - NIGHT Gwen paces in her kitchen, cooking dinner. She’s on the p ALEXANDER. (INTERCUT WITH ALEXANDER at his apartment. He’ in makeup, eating a sandwich.)
God, I don’t know, Alex. I should have gone over. He practically begged. I feel lousy.
Don’t. He’s not crazy. It’s just a desperate bid for attention.
Did you see the look in his eyes? He looked, I don’t know... Like he was a kid again.

That’s what he is, a big kid. Let me tell you something, Gwen, he needs to grow up.... And I’ll tell you something else... _..AS Alexander continues to rant on about Jason, Gwen’s is drawn to the TELEVISION.
A STARFIELD IMAGE... The TV SCIENCE REPORTER circles a br colored area of light on the image. A NASA ANIMATION show asteroid exploding and disappearing.
...scientists are at a loss to explain this explosion in space but as these Hubble photographs show, it was spectacular...  : 29.

.--The asteroid, largest in a chain called Andromeda Nine, was completely vaporized in an explosion so bright it could even be viewed by the naked eye this evening, yet distant enough that it took an estimated four hours for the light from the phenomenon to reach the earth... There's a logical explanation.
It’s true... It happened, it really... Wait, that was me! I blew up an asteroid, Alex!
Now Gwen, get ahold of yourself... This sort of thing happens every day... Supernovas, planetary anomalies...

He said the NAME. Andromeda Nine! How many Andromeda Nines get blown up every- Then suddenly something that looks like a METEOR plunges the sky and lands in Gwen’s back yard. It happened so fas she barely registered it. But sitting on her patio is a g DISK, like the one at Jason’s house.
Gwen?... Gwen?... Hypnotized, Gwen walks toward the door and goes into her.

She moves toward the POD GENERATOR. It GLOWS more brightl approaches. ALEXANDER (cont’d) Three’s a logical explanation, Gwen... ALEXANDER’S APARTMENT Alexander sees an identical streak in the sky, and a glow DISK appears right on his BALCONY.
What the hell?-
You have one too. You do, don’t you?
I... I... What is it? Where did it come from?..
He sent them down for us... What did he call it? A pod transport?...

Oh Gwen, you can’t be serious. Now- Unable to resist, she takes a step forward onto the disk. A BLINDING FLASH OF LIGHT. HER PHONE falls to the ground. ALEXANDER’S APARTMENT Alexander stands next to the pod on his balcony...

Gwen? GWEN? Oh, I see. Just like the old days. You and Jason pulling pranks on the humorless Brit. Alexander looks at the GLOWING, BECKONING disk... ALEXANDER (cont’d) I suppose you have your camcorder hidden somewhere. Fine, where is it? I‘ll play it to camera... He takes a step toward the disk.
TOMMY and GUY walk up to the front door calling for Alex.

Alex? Are you here? We were over at Marlo’s and on TV we saw... Alex, where are you? They open the door just as... IN THE BACKGROUND ON THE BA ALEXANDER STEPS ONTO THE DISK and in a flash, the transpa forms around him sealing him in and EXPLODES AWAY at ligh Tommy and Guy close the door, completely unaware.

What the hell is THAT thing? The POD GENERATOR glows on the patio...  INT. DUSTY’S APARTMENT Pan up from BARE LEGS dripping WATER on the carpet to Dus in a bathrobe straight from the shower. He scratches his chin, thoughtfully, in his calm unflappable way.

text: arrived from their horrifying journey from Earth. They st paralyzed, shivering, white as ghosts. Suddenly a streak of light appears through a hatch in the and a POD arrives right next to them, opening up to revea He stands, horrified and teeth chattering like the rest. like a bunch of horrified bowling pins all facing toward.

Beyond it they register the SOUND of WET FOOTSTEPS growin closer... Their eyes widen as they see the far door open a group of S HORRIBLE TENTACLED ALIEN MONSTERS! The monst toward them, the sound from their drooling mouths a horri SCREAMING CACOPHONY. They surround our terrified visitors tinkering with devices around them, their tentacles flyin everywhere. Oops. Crewmen, your skins! Activate your E- skins! The monsters all flip switches on their belts their forms HUMAN, uniformed as ship's TECHNICIANS.
Our most sincere apologies! We forgot about our appearance generators. Then JASON appears in the doorway, a big warm smile on hi
Guys! You CAME!... They stand there, still paralyzed and terrified.
Okay, who wants the grand tour? Guy is now relaxed enough to let out the loudest most ge SCREAM you’ve ever heard in your life. A beat.

Okay, Guy... Anybody else? Then another streak of light, and Dusty appears alongside others in his bathrobe. As his pod retracts into the floo steps off of the disk, unaffected, and walks past the oth
Now that was a hell of a thing. (to Jason, motioning to others) What's wrong with them? Jason smiles. Nothing gets to Dusty.

Jason leads Gwen, Alexander, Tommy, Guy and Dusty down th They shuffle forward like recent hospital releasees, look around silent and dumbfounded at their surroundings (ever Dusty, who takes everything in stride.) They shake their little as they walk.

That's right... Just keep shaking it out... Weird feeling going through that black hole, isn’t it? Like somebody turned you inside out set the blender on puree and poured you into a wall socket, am I right?
Wh... Where are we?
Twenty third quadrant of gamma sector. Don’t ask me. I can show you on a map. Then BETZALAR appears coming down the hall with a small g ALIENS. He has a warm smile on his face.
Welcome my friends! I am Betzalar. On behalf of my people I wish to thank you from the deepest place in our hearts. Re reaches out to shake their hands, one at a time, with deep respect.
Dr. Lazarus... Lt. Madison. Tech Sgt. Chen... Lt. Laredo... He looks at Guy quizzically, not sure who he is. Guy “Crewman #6”... Call me Guy.  33.
You... know us?

(soft laugh) I don’t believe there is a man, woman or child on my planet who does not. In the years since we first received your ship’s historical documents, we have studied, discussed and debated every facet of your missions, technologies and strategies.
Historical documents?
Yes. Eighteen years ago we received transmission of the first. It continued for four years, and then stopped, as mysteriously as it came...
You've been watching the sho- (he’s nudged by Jason) the historical records... out HERE?

Yes, I am ashamed to say, but in the last hundred years our society had fallen into disarray. Our goals, our values had become scattered. But since the transmission we have modeled many aspects of our society from your example, and it has saved us. Your courage, teamwork, optimism and resourcefulness. In fact, all you see around you now, comes from the lessons laid out in the historical documents.
THAT'S why you built this ship?
It’s... incredible.

Oh this? No, this isn’t the ship. This is only the star port for the ship. - {a twinkle in his eye) You want to see the ship? He leads them to a large square window, blocked by an opa shield, and pushes a button. Slowly with a RUMBLE the shi slides aside way revealing...

PROTECTOR DOCKED IN FRONT OF THEM...

text: They all gawk at the amazing sight, their eyes wide like  34.
It’s real. Oh my god, it’s real.
All this from watching the.. historical records?

Yes, and from your supplementary technical documents, of course... He motions to another alien who withdraws a number of bri colored BOOKS and BOXES from a backpack, and passes them The actors look through the materials... They are various BOOKS and ENTERTAINMENT SOFTWARE bearing such titles as “ OFFICIAL GALAXY QUEST BLUEPRINTS: USEA PROTECTOR” and “VI GALAXY QUEST: THE CDROM EXPERIENCE.” The actors exchange and then... ..-Tommy begins to giggle. Alex looks at him, at the fan stuff, then out at the ENOR SHIP, and he begins to laugh too... The others join in... Guy... Laughing like maniacs, hysterical, disbelieving la the GIANT SHIP hanging outside in infinite space in the background. The aliens join in too, out of joyfulness, an stands there smiling, a proud papa, as the laughter ECHOE the cosmos.

A CLEAR TRANSPORT tube runs from the docking structure to ship. Inside everyone can get a good look at the space pa as they approach the ship. The view is breathtaking. Guy So you people don’t actually... Look the way you look... Right?

No. This device on our belts simulates an appearance more familiar to you, as well as translating our language to yours. We have found from earlier visits to Earth, that our true appearance can be... distracting. The actors wave this off... “No, you look great... Fabulo One of the aliens, NEX, motions out the window to Tommy.
Lt. Laredo. It may interest you to see that we have mounted an additional Proton Afterburner over the aft proton vent. We felt it improved navigational stability. We hope it doesn’t offend.  35.
Well, I’1l have to try it out before I can comment.

(looks at Jason, shakes her head) Like throwing gasoline on a fire...

The group enters. The centerpiece to the room is a large pulsating ORB. When the orb dims, we see its surface has texture, like a large boulder. Many CREWMEN scurry about to the surrounding measurement devices.
The generator room.... Our Carbonite Sphere, of course... I hope, Tech Sergeant Chen, that this meets with your approval.
Fine... Very nice and... tidy. Three YOUNGER CREWMEN approach and whisper to Betzalar. T a bit, then Betzalar reticently approaches Dusty.
I am sorry to ask this of you so shortly after your arrival. But members of our reactor staff have a question they find most pressing.
Well certainly... What is it, son?  36.

Sir, we have had unexplained proton surges in our delta core. They cannot be verified on the sub frequency spectrum, but they appear on the valence detector when scanning the Carbonite Sphere. We are unable to resolve this problem and were hoping you would be able to advise us. Everyone turns to Dusty who takes a deep breath.
Uh huh... I see... Well, that’s a puzzler isn’t it?... A textbook puzzler... The others watch, wondering what he’ll say. Then Dusty tu one of the Techs with an air of authority.
++. You.

(testy) I haven’t got all day. What might account for this phenomenon?
Perhaps... The valence bonds have shifted?
Yes... And therefore?...
Therefore the bonding molecules have become covalent?
And if this were the case, how would you remedy it?...
(smiling, figuring it out) Introduce a bonding substrate! A two molecule compound sharing a free electron apiece and bombard the ions with their reflective isotopes! Dusty smiles, giving him a wink.
Now you’ve got it. The other TECHS grin, astonished.
Of course! It’s so obvious!
Sergeant Chen, you're... amazing! Dusty waves off the praise modestly. Betzalar shoots a lo as if to say “we're in good hands here.”
Now I suggest that you go to your cabins and rest before we take the ship out of dock. He claps his hands and a group of aliens arrive to meet t
These crewmen will escort you to quarters.

Dr. Lazarus... I hope that I’m not breaching protocol but.. I am so very humbled to stand in your presence... I have studied your missions extensively... Though I am Thermian, I have lived my life by your philosophy, by the code of the Mak’tar.
Well good, that’s very... nice.
(emotional) By Grabthar’s Hammer, Dr. Lazarus, I-
Don’t do that. I’m not kidding.
(bewildered) - I‘m sorry, sir, I was only-
Just don’t.
+-..Yes sir. (they come to a stop) Your quarters sir. INT. ALEX’S QUARTERS Quellek opens the door and they enter. The room is a grey completely barren.
This is it?  38.
Yes sir. Marvelous, isn’t it? Completely distractionless.
Where's my bed? Quellek pushes a button and FIVE LARGE SPIKES rise from t
Just as on your home planet, sir. If I may say, it took me three years to master the spikes, but now I sleep with a peace I never thought possible... Alexander points to a door.
Is that the bathroom?

Yes sir... (Alex moves to the door) The use of your waste facilities were strangely absent from the historical records, so we had to extrapolate purely on the basis of your anatomy. INT. ALEX’S BATHROOM They enter. Alex looks down at a thing that looks more li torture device than a toilet, with elaborate tubes and st and plugs going everywhere.
You're quite complicated, sir. Alex stares at the thing, despairingly. INT. TOMMY’S QUARTERS Tommy’s escort SED hands over various weapons to grinning
Here is your ion shield. Your vox. Your molecular disrupter... We know you prefer a sensitive trigger. If there is anything else you require?

Uh, no, I’m good. Thanks. (Sed starts to exit) Oh wait. Here you go. Tommy stuffs a couple of bucks into Sed’s hand. Sed looks tip, perplexed, and exits.  39. INT. GWEN’S CABIN An exotic and beautiful room. Gwen is changing into her G QUEST uniform. There’s a knock on the door.
It's Jason...
One minute, I’m - (he enters) Hey, I’m dressing!
Oh come on, it’s not like I haven’t- She glares. He turns his back while she finishes dressing
Okay. She turns. They just look at each other for a moment. Gwe out into a smile, trying to find the words.
Yeah, I know.

, I just can’t believe it. Any of it! Look at on this room!.. They designed it based on the Tauran Pleasure ship from “historical document” thirty seven. (looks at a mirror) Oh and wait, wait, listen to this! (Looks up) Computer?
“Yes?
What's the weather like outside?
There is no weather in space.
I never get tired of that joke.
Let me try. Computer? (no response) Computer?...
Only answers to me.
That‘s ridiculous. I’m the Captain.  Jason 40.
On the show I talk to the computer and repeat what it says. So that’s what they built.
Computer? COMPUTER?
Computer?
Yes?
{singsong, teasing Jason) I can talk to the compuuuuter and youuuu Caaaan’t... smiles.
So when are you going to tell them? The aliens.
Tell them? About...
Who we are. Don’t you think they’re going to be
I’m net going to tell them.
Well you have to tell them. What if something happens? Something dangerous.
Then we'll take care of it.
“We'll take care of it.” Listen to you. We’re actors. We’re not astronauts, we’re not adventurers... We pretend. We didn’t even write the scripts!

Look, these people are depending on us. They’ve structured their whole lives based on the show. I’m not going to be the one to bring their entire civilization crashing down just because of a little thing called the truth.
You want to play space man.
They have a problem. We can help them.  41.
Are you nuts? We can’t do this stuff!
It’s not the STUFF. The STUFF isn’t the thing... I mean, anybody can learn the STUFF... The important thing is COMMITMENT. 99% of anything is just committing to it.
99% of ACTING is commitment. ACTING. Stella Adler never manned a neutron cannon, she taught ACTING...
Secretly you agree with me.
Secretly you know things about me is so smug I just wane to smack you right in your smug little-
Do we have to always fight on the spaceship?
Computer do we always have to fight on the spaceship?
This is not required.
Well.
Well. They smile at each other. Gwen looks around, giddy.
We're in space. A CREWMAN appears in the doorway.
Sir, Betzalar requests your presence on the command deck.
Jason and Gwen turn a corner and join up with Tommy, Alex Guy. They keep walking toward the command deck.
What's going on?

That should be something to see...
They enter and gawk at the familiar hub, waiting for the start... not realizing they ARE the show.
If you would all take your positions, we can exit the space port.
Oh, right... US! Yes, of course... US! They take their positions, marveling at the familiar cont panels in front of them. Tommy turns to Guy.
Look.. This thingy... I remember I had it all worked out... This was forward, this was back...

Captain, some of the crew has requested to be present at this historic event. Betzalar motions and a few CREWMEN enter, followed by a d more... followed by FIFTY more. They stand around the per of the room, watching eagerly.
{whispers to Guy) No pressure, huh? Glad I’m not the Captain.
Okay, Laredo, take her out. Everyone in the room turns their attention to Tommy. His Sarcastic smile drops. He looks mortified.
Excuse me?

They designed the ship from watching you. So... Take her out, Lieutenant... Tommy stares down at his control panel. It’s pretty self explanatory, a throttle and a circular dial for direction daunting nonetheless,

Right. Okay, yeah, sure. Everyone’s eyes are glued to him as he moves the throttle slightly. The ENGINES COME TO LIFE, a massive exhilaratin Tommy giggles nervously.  43. His hand trembles as he pushes the throttle further. The start to move. Gwen and the others exchange worried glanc

You can feel the WEIGHT of the giant craft as it eases fo sliding through the sides of the dock.

More to the left... Stay parallel...
Hey, YOU want to drive?
Indeed, the ship is slightly off course... It’s like tryi out of a tight parking space with concrete walls to eithe And the ship is veering ever so slightly into one of the

Tommy turns the dial to correct... But it looks like the might carry the ship into the wall anyway... Tommy PEGS t to the left... The others hold their breath as the bow of moves closer and closer to the wall... Will it correct in moves a hair’s width next to the wall... Then... It TOUCHES. The sound of a soft but high pitched SCRAAAAA
Oh shit. 7

All eyes are on Tommy. He doesn’t know what to do... Shou continue forward, or back up, and scrape again for sure? classic parking lot dilemma, magnified by ten thousand. T grasps the throttle and moves it slightly forward... SCRA He keeps going, in too deep to back out now... And the sh continues to SCRAAAAAPE for a couple of horrible seconds completes the curve... .-.and then it is free. The beautiful craft glides slowly open space... Jason and the others let out a sigh of reli

Mark two, Captain.

The crew and various aliens sit around the large table, e extravagant meal. Betzalar makes a toast.

To our brave guests. Few in this universe have the opportunity to meet their heroes. We are blessed to count ourselves among them. Everyone clinks glasses. Quellek clinks glasses with Alex brimming with admiration. Tek turns to Tommy.
We are sorry about the instrumentation, Lt. Laredo. Obviously there must have been an alignment problem in the steerage mechanism.
Yes, well.. As long as it doesn’t happen again.
How are you enjoying your food, Lt. Madison?
Oh it’s fantastic. French is my favorite.

Yes, we programed the food sythesizer for each of you based on the regional menu of your birthplace. (turns to Alexander) Are you enjoying your Kep-mok bloodticks Dr. Lazarus? Alexander, miserable, toys with a bowl of living insects in a disgustingly vomit-textured broth.
Just like mother used to make. He pushes the bowl away, nauseated.
Tell me, Betzalar, this character we're flying to meet... Sarris... What is it he wants exactly?  45.

For years, Sarris has plundered the resources of our planet: Our people, our technologies. We built this ship in order to find a new planet to settle. One far away from Sarris. We are not a people accustomed to confrontation. We are scientists. This ship was our salvation. A tick jumps off of Alexander’ spoon back into the soup.
But Sarris found out about our plans just as we had completed construction of the Protector II. He heard about the device... The Omega 13.
The Omega 13... Why does that sound so familiar?...
The lest footage. At the convention. The mysterious device in our last episo-- historical document.
What is it? What does it do?
We don’t know.
But... You built one, right?

We built... something.. from the blueprints and what references we could find on your internet... Our computer neural nets made educated guesses in areas we were uncertain. So there is actually much about the device we don’t even understand. We were hoping you could enlighten us.
Well, it’s... This was a device we... He looks around for someone to help him. Gwen just shrugs
...discovered on an alien planet. We don’t know what it does either.
Why don’t you just turn it on, and see what it does?
It has at its core a reactor capable of generating unthinkable energy. (MORE)

TEK (cont’d) . ' If we were mistaken in our construction by even the slightest calculation, the device would act as a molecular explosive, causing a chain reaction that would obliterate all matter in the universe.
Right, maybe nix on the turn it on thing then.
Betzalar?... Has Sarris seen the... historical records?
No, Thank God he has not.
Then how did he find out about the device?
Our former Captain was not... Strong. Betzalar looks down, somber.
Former Captain?

I’m sorry. You deserve to be shown. He nods to a Crewman who pushes a button and a wall panel aside to reveal a large viewscreen. An image appears on t screen with a lot of static, and the sound cuts in and ou

The tape was partially demagnetized as it was smuggled off of Sarris’ ship. But through the static we can make out an image: The form CAPTAIN, im ALIEN form, is strapped to a metal board. Eac wrists and ankles is secured with mechanical devices and in different directions.
Qriginally, one of our own people tried to ead... In the IMAGE Sarris stands over the alien with a control

Is that all? You have no more to confess to me? No? After three days of this you still require incentive? Sarris moves switches on the panel. The device pulls at t alien’s limbs, twisting them horribly. Bones crackle.  a7.
I say again... I have told you all I know! To my shame, I have told you everything. You must believe me.
I do believe you.
Then if you have any mercy within you, please, let me die.

Oh I shall, I shall... When I grow weary of the noises you make, my little plaything, he assured, you shall die... Sarris toys with his control panel. Jason, we're going to use the molecular conveyer to get you out of there. Jason pokes at the pig-lizard. It HISSES at him petulantl

I’1l take my chances with Gorignak. The pig lizard NIPS at Jason, getting a bite. Jason stabs

Theoretically the mechanism is fully operational. However, it was built to accommodate your anatomy, not ours. Our actual hands are six fingered and jointed at ninety degrees to yours. We are unable to operate the device with the required dexterity. But now that Sergeant Chen is here he can operate it... It was designed watching his motions from the historical records. {singsong) Nothing.

+.-And it exploded!

You have to. They based it on YOUR hand movements. Dusty backs away, terror in his face... He starts talking himself nervously...

All my professional life they’d say “can you ride a horse” Dusty? And I’d say “Of course, been riding since I was a boy.” “Can you fence Dusty?” “Funny you should ask, I’ve won six international competitions.” I learned never to say I can’t do something. You don’t get the part if you say “I can’t do this.” So I said “sure!” because after you're cast, a stuntman does the fall, somebody’s hands play the piano for you... But this is life or death!
